content.raw:
Pull-request #91 has some problems associated with auto-generation of xml schema files from SDF files. For example the following is considered valid the auto-generated schemas:

<link name="link">
    <inertial>       ...    </inertial>
    <inertial>       ...    </inertial>
</link>

An error should appear about multiple inertial values.

Once auto-generation is in place. I'll have to manually modify the XML schema files. At this point, we'll also switch over to using only the XML schema files. This will take a bit of work.
content.html:
Pull-request #91 has some problems associated with auto-generation of xml schema files from SDF files. For example the following is considered valid the auto-generated schemas:

<link name="link"> <inertial> ... </inertial> <inertial> ... </inertial> </link>

An error should appear about multiple inertial values.

Once auto-generation is in place. I'll have to manually modify the XML schema files. At this point, we'll also switch over to using only the XML schema files. This will take a bit of work.
